Sp-L: Got my Gobi Go Go GO!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher Advance 2 Archive (GameBoy Advance): The Shrine (Passwords and Unlocking): Special Breeds and Legendary Breeds: Sp-L: Got my Gobi Go Go GO!
By GoldenBoy on Tuesday, December 31, 2002 - 08:17 am:

Turns out my Golem just needed a decent amount of
INT 500+ how lame. Anyway.

1) Raise a Golem (Recommend pure or special just
in case breed is a requirement)

2) Bring him to Promiass and go to the NW bldg:
LEFT, STRAIGHT, RIGHT, STRAIGHT, STRAIGHT, STRAIGHT, LEFT, LEFT

3) Holly will stop to fix her makeup, see an
inscription which Kanab translates for the
password LastARMS, unlocking Gobi.

Props to M3ello over at gamefaqs for the original
find, even if he can't give directions to save
his life ;)

By John Hawley on Tuesday, December 31, 2002 - 02:53 pm:

Congratulations, GB and Congrats to me3llo for the find.

hey gb you cant go left u got to go straight first

By GoldenBoy on Wednesday, January 1, 2003 - 05:43 am:

Straight isn't a choice, since there is no other
way to go. If "u got to go" that way, then I
don't need to list it do I?

Think of it this way, when the game puts a choice in front of Holly, she asks herself "What would GB do?" or WWGBD?

By Darkstar on Wednesday, January 1, 2003 - 09:28 pm:

It's looking like there's more of a requirement to this than we thought. My INT is around 478 and my pure Golem is at Master Rank and it isn't unlocking for me.

By Darkstar on Wednesday, January 1, 2003 - 09:30 pm:

Brought my INT up to 507 and now it works. So you have to get your Golem over 500 INT to unlock Gobi.
